==Shop==
{{Vendor|Marjorie}}

==NPCs==
* [[Marjorie]]

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A popular souvenir shop in Mondstadt. It is also a place for able adventurers to pawn precious items for [[Anemo Sigil]]s. Marjorie's at your service!|[[Map]] description}}

==Trivia==
* During daytime, a music box tune can be heard coming from the inside of the building. The closer the player is to the shop, the louder the music will be. This can be heard from any side of the building.
